short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open TiddlyWiki files from Google Drive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click on .html or .htm TiddlyWiki files in Google Drive and open them with Tiddly Drive. Use TiddlyWiki as usual and when you save, it will save straight back to Google Drive.

Click the settings button on the bottom right to configure the app to be just right for your wiki. There is even a feature to save with hotkeys.

The official info page can be found at http://lordratte.info/tiddlydrive/

If you want to report an issue or need support, please file an issue here: https://github.com/tiddlydrive/tiddlydrive.github.io/issues

For status updates, check the Twitter feed: https://twitter.com/Lord_Ratte

Donate via Bitcoin: 1KWgrQZM1mTrzoo6GKo1ijTbXPSWcaVRbY
